title: France panorama. [No. 74/49]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. The hundred facets of Paris: Facades - the capital’s new classified monuments. The street - Miro’s “Lunar bird”. Face-lifting for a museum - the new look of the Modern Arts Museum. 2. Clouds - anti-hail and meteorological research. 3. The arts - Orvan and her steel.
